عزیز میاں اللہ پاک درجات بلند فرمائے آمین

Aziz Mian Qawwal was one of Pakistan's leading traditional qawwals and also famous for singing ghazals in his own unique style of qawwali. Aziz mian is honorably considered as Shahenshah E Qawwali which means The Ultimate King Of Qawwali, he is considered to be one of the Greatest Qawwali singers of all time.
